title: ResourceQuota for Object Count
description: Create a ResourceQuota named ||object-quota|| in namespace ||neptune|| that limits the namespace to maximum ||10|| pods and ||5|| services.

validations.command: kubectl get resourcequota object-quota -n neptune -o jsonpath='{.spec.hard.pods}'
kubectl get resourcequota object-quota -n neptune -o jsonpath='{.spec.hard.services}'
